title: Sherry spritz
description: Rustle up a fragrant Christmas cocktail with our easy sherry spritz recipe. Combine creamy sherry and ginger syrup, then top with cava.

method.Step 1: Put the cream sherry (vegan if you need it to be) and 1 tbsp ginger syrup in an ice-filled glass, then stir to chill. Add a twist of orange, then top up with cava.
